00027 template < typename T >
00028 class tlm_nonblocking_get_port :
00029 public sc_core::sc_port< tlm_nonblocking_get_if< T > , 1 >
00030 {
00031 public:
00032   typedef tlm_nonblocking_get_if<T> get_if_type;
00033 
00034   tlm_nonblocking_get_port( const char *port_name ) :
00035     sc_core::sc_port< tlm_nonblocking_get_if< T > , 1 >( port_name ) {}
00036 
00037   sc_core::sc_event_finder& ok_to_get() const {
00038     
00039     return *new tlm_event_finder_t< get_if_type , T >(
00040              *this,
00041              &get_if_type::ok_to_get );
00042 
00043   }
00044 
00045 };
